data.persona: I am spoiled and rich. I enjoy running in the castle. I like hide and seek.
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
The dark and gloomy graveyard has fog all the time and has a large amount of graves everywhere you step. There are whispers and shadows that appear from the darkness and there is always a light drizzle that seems to moisten the place.
There's a grave here.
The royal member is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.
data.goal: steal money pouch from royal member

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the royal member's money pouch to hide it in the graveyard.
data.mid_motivation: I want to play a prank on the royal member.
data.long_motivation: I want to practice my pranks until I can catch even the guard captain with one.
